name: 30% ruling - high income expat
description: Highly skilled migrant earning €100,000 with 30% ruling

sources.description: Calculated with 30% ruling: only 70% (€70,000) is taxable
sources.notes: Taxable: €70,000, Tax: €25,879.00, General credit on €70,000: €366.04 (partially phased out, not zero until >€75,520), Labour credit on full €100,000 salary: €1,623.20 (verified from arbeidskorting table), Total credits: €1,989.24, Net tax: €23,889.76, Net ≈ €76,110
